description: Transform hard-boiled eggs into a cute Easter snack with this quick and easy Egg bunny recipe. To make it egg-stra special, get the kids involved in the decorating.
keywords: Breakfast,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Easter,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Egg Bunny Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: rosemary leaves, dill sprigs and currants

recipeInstructions.text: Boil eggs in a small saucepan of water over medium-high heat for 8 minutes for hard-boiled. Drain eggs. Run cold water over eggs to cool, then peel.
Halve one egg lengthways. Use one half to make the bunny body. Halve the remaining half to make bunny ears. Cut remaining egg into 5 slices crossways.

Peel and slice carrot diagonally, then trim pieces to resemble smaller carrots and to create a bunny nose and chicken beaks (see picture). Using the picture as a guide, arrange all egg slices on a plate with bunny body and bunny ears, and use rosemary, dill and currants to finish.
